long_description: This larger sized Grabber Mega warmer pad supplies 20 sq. in. of warmth for up to 12 hrs.! To use, simply open packet-contents are air-activated, providing heat for up to 12 hrs.; great for use in pockets, sleeping bags or just about anywhere else. Packet maintains a temperature of 135 - 166degF, and can be wrapped in cloth if it feels too warm. Made of environmentally safe, nontoxic materials; ingredients include iron, water, cellulose, vermiculite, activated carbon and salt. Disposable Grabber Mega warmer is designed for 1-time use. Includes 1 Mega warmer pad. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This larger sized Grabber Mega warmer pad supplies 20 sq. in. of warmth for up to 12 hrs.!
